transcript:
Customer: Krishna Vasudevaya Hare Parmatmane Pranat

Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello Desai Hardware and General store se baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Ji haan.
Customer: Ji good afternoon sir Kavita Rawat this side from India Mart call kar rahi thi sir aap 9696 pe koi problem aa rahi thi services ke regarding?
Customer: Haan ji wo kuch training ki baat hui thi to ab tak koi update nahi tha to janna tha ki kab hoga ye training session kya hoga.
Executive: Waise abhi hamari side se schedule nahi hui thi but aapne call kar diya hai to main aapko provide karwa deti hu sir aap apna registered email id bolenge sir ya jo bhi mail id aapka login ho.
Customer: Desai Hardware
Hm?
Customer: Gulsar
Executive: Desai Hardware
Customer: Gulsar
Executive: Alsar
Customer: @gmail.com

Executive: Aapke pass detail hai ye sab madam.
Customer: Sir wo hoti hai but hame email id nahi dikhti to email id isiliye li hai.
Customer: Abhi isme spell out kya likha ho kya nahi fir mail nahi aayega.
Executive: Nahi mail id automatically mail chala jayega hame just yaha pe enter karna hota hai.

Executive: Service kaise use karne wale hain aap system ke through karenge ya mobile app ke through?
Customer: System system sir.
Executive: Dekhiye mail id pe mail aaya sir aapko.
Customer: Aapka mail aa gaya hai mujhe Monday November 17th 10:45 am to 11:40 join with Google Meet sir.
Executive: Monday to khatam ho gaya ye.
Customer: Sir ye aaj ke liye hai abhi main aapko guide karungi na call pe reh ke ye join karenge main aapko guide karungi.
Customer: Par nahi hai aisa thodi ho sakta hai wo mujhe ab kal ke liye appointment dijiye subah 9:30 10 baje abhi right now kaise turant thodi na meeting kar sakte hain.
Executive: Achcha aapne call kiya tha na sir to mujhe laga aaj hi janna hai aapko customer care pe.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi maine bataya tha ki main puch raha hu ki mujhe kal ke liye mil sakta hai kya training appointment.
Executive: Achcha kal ke liye chahiye bilkul mil sakta hai kal kis time pe de karna hai?
Customer: Kal aap mujhe 10 o clock ka appointment de dijiye kitne ghante ka rahega session?
Executive: Sir hardly 15 minute ka.
Customer: Chalega subah 10 o clock de dijiye na.
Executive: Achcha 10 o clock de deti hu aur koi concern to nahi tha aapko?
Customer: Ji nahi ye training dekhna tha.
Executive: Achcha theek hai kal ki aapke schedule ho jayegi yaha se.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Ji to yaha se main aapke ticket close kar du aapko training schedule ye ticket jo open kiya tha aapne?
Customer: Haan wo kar sakte ho aap lekin wo ek bar email aa jaye to better hai ki kal ka appointment.
Executive: Mail maine mail maine kal ki training ka schedule karke aapke sang share kar diya aapke pass schedule ka mail aa gaya hoga sir.
Customer: Okay okay still abhi tak to nahi aaya hai wo pichla email hi hai wo schedule.
Executive: Ek second ek second aap pehle mail receive kar lijiye then hum ise close karenge ek second.
Customer: Yes yes to ticket close kar denge.
Executive: Theek hai ek second.

Executive: Mail aaya sir abhi?
Customer: Tuesday 18 November 4:30 am to 5:30 am kaise hoga wo?
Executive: Maine 10 kiya hai nahi hoga.
Customer: Chalo theek hai when when okay 10 am to 11 am chalo done pakka hai thank you thank you so much aap close kar sakte ho abhi wo ticket.
Executive: Ticket close ka aapke pass mail aayega sir ki aap mere dwara di gayi jankari se sehmat hai ki nahi to us pe please apna positive feedback dena agar koi doubt hai to is call pe bhi aap bata sakte hain.
Customer: Ji ji thank you ji thank you okay.
Executive: Thank you aur main hi aapke account manager rahungi aapke number main aapko ek bar whatsapp pe pin kar dungi aap us number se mujhe connect bhi kar sakte hain theek hai sir.
Customer: Please please okay.
Executive: Okay thank you.
Customer: Thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Enquired about pending training session schedule.

- Wanted training appointment for the next day.



Resolution:

- Executive scheduled training for the next day.

- Rescheduled the training time as per customer request.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- training, appointment, schedule, email
